name: Project Horizon
description:
BSU Game Dev project 4.

Full play-through video:

(For grading, I think watching the trailer and this first before the DevLog will showcase the game best, since the DevLog video is somewhat choppy due to being broken up into topical clips)

Requirements video:

17 minutes long. Feel free to watch on 2x

Description:

Take on a mission to save the galaxy from the rare and dangerous chemical RZ-9. Blast your way through a heavily fortified covert drilling site so that the volatile liquid can be safely seized and disposed of before falling into the wrong hands... or at least that's what you're told. As an experienced gun-for-hire you've seen things go south before, especially when dealing with powerful and wealthy intergalactic interest groups.

Controls:

[DISCLAIMER] This game is designed for use with an Xbox controller; mouse/keyboard is not currently supported. Other controllers can be used, but may need input remapping. If you load the game without a controller, it can still be exited using the escape key.

Move Forward-Backward / Strafe: left joystick

Turn / Look Up-Down: right joystick

Jump / Enable Vertical Thrust: left joystick button

Thrusters: left trigger

Quick-Boost: right trigger

Sword: left shoulder button

Rifle: right should button

Quit Game: back button (or escape)
